input:
WITH expired AS (
  SELECT session_id FROM sessions WHERE expires_at < datetime('now')
)
UPDATE users
SET active_session = NULL
WHERE session_id IN (SELECT session_id FROM expired)
RETURNING id;

outputs.expected: WITH expired AS ( SELECT session_id FROM sessions WHERE expires_at < datetime ( ? ) ) UPDATE users SET active_session = ? WHERE session_id IN ( SELECT session_id FROM expired ) RETURNING id
